preguntas.title: QUESTIONS
preguntas.q1: What can I see on the home page?
preguntas.a1: All posts created by all users in the program are displayed on the home page.
preguntas.q2: How can I create, modify, or delete a post?
preguntas.a2: Go to the menu on the left and redirect to the 'MY CARS POSTS' page. Unafortunately, we regret that these functions are currently not available in terms of functionality.
preguntas.q3: Can I log into my account without having to log in again if I haven't logged out?
preguntas.a3: Of course! The program is designed so that once you enter it you can do it again without entering your data again unless you decide to log out.
preguntas.q4: How can I know who was responsible for creating this program?
preguntas.a4: You can access general information about the program's author on the 'About Me' page.
